label: 厳島神社
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A national Shintō shrine (kampeisha) in Aki-no-kuni, being the main Shintō shrine of the province (ichi-no-miya ). Sussanoo-no-Mikoto is one of the Daities (Kami) worshiped there. [官幣社、一宮、素戔嗚尊、神]
